QuestData.Title: Marking the Path
QuestData.Description: With the rock flayer population thinned, all that's left is to signal the safe path to our pilgrims. Return to the Great Fissure with this torch and seek the three beacons that mark the path from the east.$B$BLight the three beacons and return to me. Be warned that the beacons will attract any nearby rock flayers when you first light them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ranger Captain Venn'ren at Falcon Watch wants you to go to the Great Fissure in Hellfire Peninsula and light the Southern Beacon, Western Beacon and Central Beacon. Return to him with the Lit Torch after you've completed this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you done what I asked of you, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: The Great Fissure, though still dangerous, will prove to be a useful path for our pilgrims.$B$BWith the Alliance watching all the roads in and out of Falcon Watch this is the manner of desperate act that is required of us.
